title: 2017/03/07: The Resurrection of Logos
description:
This is a talk that happened about a week ago, featuring the Rev. Fr. Theodore Paraskevopoulus, Dr. Jordan B Peterson, Jonathan Pageau (http://pageaucarvings.com/index.html) and the very Rev. Fr. Geoffrey Ready.

We talk about the possibilities of the revival of Logos in the modern world.
